import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new vendor"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new vendor in the invoicing system. Vendors represent external service providers for utility billing, supplier invoicing, and cost management.

**Workflow Example**
1. Prepare vendor data including name, address, and optional utility types.
2. Call this endpoint: [POST /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/new](/docs/api/invoicing/create-vendor) with the vendor object.
3. Extract `Item.VendorId` from response for subsequent operations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Name`, `SiteId`

**Optional Fields**: `Address` (full address object), `Telephone`, `UtilityTypes` (array of utility service associations)

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors](/docs/api/invoicing/get-all-vendors) - List existing vendors
- [POST /api/v1.0/invoicing/vendors/\{id\}](/docs/api/invoicing/update-vendor) - Update vendor details

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The vendor object to create.","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"A vendor in the invoicing system. Vendors represent external suppliers or service providers that can be associated with utility invoices.","properties":{"VendorId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the vendor."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The site this vendor belongs to."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the vendor has been soft-deleted."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"The display name of the vendor."},"UtilityTypes":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"List of utility types this vendor provides.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines a type of utility service (electricity, water, gas, etc.) that can be tracked in invoices.","properties":{"UtilityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this utility type."},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Visibility scope for entities within the system.","enum":["System","Global","Site","Product"],"example":"Global","title":"Scopes"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site this utility type is scoped to, if site-specific."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product this utility type is associated with, if applicable."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the utility type (e.g., 'Electricity', 'Natural Gas')."},"Units":{"type":"string","description":"Unit of measurement for this utility type (e.g., 'kWh', 'Therms', 'Gallons')."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the utility type has been soft-deleted."}},"required":["Name"],"title":"VendorUtilityType"}},"Address":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Physical address information for a vendor.","properties":{"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this address record."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The site this address belongs to."},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line."},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary street address line (suite, building, etc.)."},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name."},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or code."},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic latitude been soft-deleted."}},"title":"VendorAddress"}],"nullable":true,"type":"object","description":"The vendor's address information."},"Telephone":{"type":"string","description":"The vendor's contact telephone number."}},"title":"Vendor"},"example":{"Name":"Demo Energy Services","SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","Address":{"Street1":"456 Demo Avenue","City":"Demo City","State":"DC","Zip":"12345","Country":"USA"},"Telephone":"555-987-6543","UtilityTypes":[]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
